description: Icon of virtual machine or template.

comment.description: Free text containing comments about this object.

description.description: A human-readable description in plain text.

media_type.description:
Format of icon file.

One of:

* `image/jpeg`
* `image/png`
* `image/gif`

data.description: Base64 encode content of the icon file.

name.description: A human-readable name in plain text.
